name: Elements_Weathered_Espresso_Upholstered_Dining_Bench
reviews: Beautiful bench, nicely upholstered in a beige polyester fabric; classic style and very appropriate for the end of a bed, which is how I used it.
Easy to assemble and super high stiff structure so the quality on this piece was very important because it gets high usage. And it's beautiful.
Looks like a bench that would cost so much more. Perfect in front of queen bed.

Easy to put together. I'm using it in place of two chairs in my traditional dining room in an effort to make the set less "stuffy". It was easy to put together, and it's sturdy. Perfect height, and it's comfortable. Love the nailhead trim.
I purchased 2 of these for my dining room table area. Love them and they look beautiful.
I love this bench, I just wish it was a little bit more comfortable!
Comfortable to sit on, just like pictured

This bench is elegant looking and the wood color is great - medium brown & distressed grey. The cushions are not super comfortable, but not uncomfortable. I weigh 120 lbs. and can feel that is sinks in the middle a decent amount. I wish there were recommendations for matching dining tables and chairs.
Great piece, complements our RH furniture seamlessly. Great price and great buy!

When i purchased this bench, the first photo in the listing was not there, so i was expecting the color of the legs to be more of a grey/brown as shown in the rest of the pictures. the first picture now accurately shows the coloring. Quality of the bench is good, sturdy cushion without being too hard. comfy to sit on.
The perfect addition to my dining table. Very comfortable and adds seating that can be moved around the room easily.
Comfortable and stylish bench for our farm table. The wood has a light weathered effect that is subtle and realistic. The seat is comfortable.
I love this bench. It looks more than the price. great buy.
Great dining bench and so comfortable. Love this purchase.
Came just as shown. Well made, Very happy.
love the way it looks, materials seem quality. the cushioning isnt dense enough , when you sit it goes down more than id like

I am using this dining chair as an ottoman for the end of my king bed. My king bed has espresso feet and although the wood is a weathered espresso it looks very nice together. The color is the an oatmeal color. Matches my potterybarn bed exactly!
THE BENCH LINEN WAS FILTHY UNFORTUNATELY EVEN THOUGH I LOVES THE FINISH WAS NOT HAPPY WITH MT PURCHASE.
Well constructed. Colors true to pictures. I nice complement to place the end of your bed.
easy to assemble and looks nice

Purchased this bench for the end of my King size bed so my lap dog had a tier in between the floor and my very tall bed. I sprayed it with Scotchguard. It may be a little stiff to sit on for some, but for my use, it was perfect.
I love this bench. It was a great price and adds an elegant flair to my bedroom.
description:
Add to your dining room's look and function with this elegant padded dining bench by Elements. This bench's solid wood construction ensures lasting durability. A weathered espresso finish enhances its traditional appearance, and the piece's natural linen upholstery provides added comfort. Use the upholstered dining bench as extra or replacement table seating, or place it as a sophisticated accent piece in a dining room, entryway or hallway.
Solid wood legs, beautiful detail on legs and bench apron, nail head trimNon-mar foot glidesSet includes: One (1) benchMaterials: Solid wood, plywood, fabric, foamFinish: Weathered espressoUpholstery color: Natural LinenUpholstery fill: FoamSeat dimensions: 18 inches high x 48 inches wide x 18 inches deepDimensions: 18 inches high x 48 inches wide x 18 inches deepStyleRustic, Shabby Chic, TraditionalMaterialLinen, WoodChair TypeBenchesSet SizeSingleAssemblyAssembly RequiredChair Back HeightBacklessColorBrown, Off-WhiteFurniture PatternSolid
